laazotea.indi

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a some Constants and convenience functions to deal with them used in several parts of the INDI for Java libraries.
    Version:
    1.31, April 10, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]

      • parseLightState

        public static Constants.LightStates parseLightState(java.lang.String state)
                                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses a Light State
        Parameters:
        state - a string representation of the Light State to be parsed ("Alert" or "Busy" or "Ok" or "Idle").
        Returns:
        The parsed Light State
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the state is not a valid one.

      • isValidLightState

        public static boolean isValidLightState(java.lang.String state)
        Checks if a string corresponds to a valid LightState.
        Parameters:
        state - The string to check
        Returns:
        true if it corresponds to a valid LightState. false otherwise.
